post.body: Hiii...how are you?? I read some days back in the newspapers tht you r participating in tour de france...hope tht its 8th
you can actually say tht ....i have 16 days gap between my last 2 papers...now hows that for some mini vacation??
no probs...hey finished downloading zack and miri....will watch later
hmmm ...there is a better way to become c grade quickly....go on tellin every1 tht Upen Patel is ur fav actor
thanks 4 telling. Hey did u watch transporter 3 ? Is it good?
thanks 4 telling. Hey did u watch transporter 3 ? Is it good?
joginder who? Is he some politician?
hey i dnt kno bout the cost but its pretty annoying as it takes hell lot of time 2 send the sms
Im fine.Studyin for my next paper. How are u??
btw did u kno tht Mumbai is the 1st city in the world 2 hav ladies compartment in trains
the mumbai locals r the best. I cant imagine travellin without the locals. Its a different xperience
Happy birthday
Good morning
i follow lance. He tweeted about the movie in the morning
The funny thing is Slumdog is based on Mumbai city but it hasnt yet released here
i kno tht ur teacher. U tld tht in an earlier direct mess. Thts y i askd u da questn. Its nice 2 kno tht u take out time 4 movi
hey ru a teacher or movie critic(or ny job relatd 2 movies). U watch atleast 1 movie per day. Where do u get so much time
Thanks 4 the wishes. Enjoy the new year
Hey its even Dhirubhai Ambani's birthday. 2 great ppl born on this day. Looks like its special. Btw its my mom's bthday tday

Ur right.And sometimes the bus is little tilted.Scary
Yup,Asin is very beautiful.
where you live in America?
yup Asin is very beautiful. In the song aye bacchu she looks super sexy

ya ur right. But i will watch it again on the 1st day at the nearest multiplex
Hey just saw Slumdog ...its awesome.Do watch it as early as possible
Hey i just watched Slumdog Millionaire.Its one of the best movie i have seen. Damn good
Mornin was good.Did jogging as im participating in Mumbai Marathon.And then some studies.How bout u?It must be night in US
i agree with most of the points.
There r rumous tht the ppl who fill online aieee forms get centers as far as Andaman n Nicobar. Its false. Just confirmd with aieee office
Yesterday parents n students startd protesting outside the bank selling forms in Thane as no forms were available #protest
And the main problem is many ppl dnt kno tht forms r available online
Students appearin 4 aieee xams worried as no forms available r available thruout Mumbai n Thane. They hav been tryin since 4 days
Good morning every1
Arsenal lose to Porto. ManU draw with AaB. Real win 3-0
Finally 3g arrives in India. Currently only MTNL is providing it. I want 2 kno wht r the charges 4 using it
